<title level="1" right="Trait">[Cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 629 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Effects with this trait deal cold damage. Creatures with this trait have a connection to magical cold.
name: Cold
